2003 Cellular antiviral responses against influenza A virus are countered at the posttranscriptional level by the viral NS1A protein via its binding to a cellular protein required for the 3′ end processing of cellular pre-mRNAS. Virology 307: 386– 395. doi: 10.1016/s0042-6822(02)00127-7. 12667806
